series.series.name: PULSE: MOTHERS DAY -- GIFTS A MOTHER COULD LOVE

block.p: Like the aroma of fresh apple pie, needlepoint pillows embroidered with sweet sayings instantly call to mind everyone's favorite mother. But forget ''Home Is Where the Heart Is.'' This version, with sayings like ''Happiness is having a nice loving family/In another city,'' is for the next generation, who spend their time on the couch analyzing, not fluffing, cushions. (theweddinglist .com; $48)
